entry.value: suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))%%00010library(iq)%%00010%%00010df <- knime.in%%00010algorithms <- unlist(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["algorithm"]], ','))%%00010%%00010# Prepare long table%%00010df$ID <- 0:(nrow(df)-1)%%00010%%00010df_long <- df |>%%00010%%00009gather(-ID, -PG, key = 'Experiment', value = 'Intensity')%%00010%%00010# Normalization bool%%00010median_bool <- ifelse(knime.flow.in[["median_bool"]] == 1, TRUE, FALSE)%%00010%%00010# Preprocess, remove low intensity ions%%00010norm_data <- iq::preprocess(df_long,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 primary_id = 'PG',%%00010 sample_id = 'Experiment', %%00010 secondary_id = 'ID',%%00010 intensity_col = 'Intensity',%%00010 median_normalization = median_bool,%%00010 pdf_out = NULL)%%00010%%00010# Perform MaxLFQ %%00010df_final <- data.frame('PG' = character(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 'sample' = character(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 'quantity' = numeric())%%00010%%00010if ('MaxLFQ' %in% algorithms) { %%00010%%00009result <- fast_MaxLFQ(norm_data)%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009# Dfs with results%%00010%%00009result_df <- as.data.frame(result$estimate)%%00010%%00009result_df_delog_maxlfq <- result_df |>%%00010%%00009%%00009mutate_all(function(x) 2^x)%%00010%%00010%%00009# Rename columns%%00010%%00009colnames(result_df_delog_maxlfq) <- paste0(knime.flow.in[["prefix_maxlfq"]], colnames(result_df_delog_maxlfq))%%00010%%00010%%00009result_df_delog_maxlfq <- result_df_delog_maxlfq |>%%00010%%00009%%00009rownames_to_column('PG') |>%%00010%%00009%%00009gather(-PG, key = 'sample', value = 'quantity')%%00010%%00010%%00009df_final <- rbind(df_final, result_df_delog_maxlfq)%%00010}%%00010%%00010if ('Top3' %in% algorithms) {%%00010%%00009peptide_list <- create_protein_list(norm_data)%%00010%%00009result <- create_protein_table(peptide_list, method = 'topN', N = 3)%%00010%%00010%%00009# Dfs with results%%00010%%00009result_df <- as.data.frame(result$estimate)%%00010%%00009result_df_delog_top3 <- result_df |>%%00010%%00009%%00009mutate_all(function(x) 2^x)%%00010%%00010%%00009# Rename columns%%00010%%00009colnames(result_df_delog_top3) <- paste0(knime.flow.in[["prefix_top"]], colnames(result_df_delog_top3))%%00010%%00010%%00009result_df_delog_top3 <- result_df_delog_top3 |>%%00010%%00009%%00009rownames_to_column('PG') |>%%00010%%00009%%00009gather(-PG, key = 'sample', value = 'quantity')%%00010%%00010%%00009df_final <- rbind(df_final, result_df_delog_top3)%%00010}%%00010%%00010knime.out <- df_final

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
